snippet: The statistician who writes the FiveThirtyEight blog for The New York Times is said to be moving that franchise to ESPN.
abstract: Nate Silver, statistician who writes the FiveThirtyEight blog for The New York Times, is leaving the paper and moving his franchise to ESPN.
lead_paragraph: The statistician who writes the FiveThirtyEight blog for The New York Times is said to be moving that franchise to ESPN.

headline.main: Nate Silver of FiveThirtyEight Blog Is to Join ESPN Staff
headline.print_headline: Blogger For Times Is to Join ESPN Staff
